Author: attick, daemitus, VariableVixen
Name: XIV Combo Very Expanded
Description: This plugin condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. To a degree that some would call absurd, but that's why it's all configurable. Let the players decide.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: XIV Instant Messenger
Description:
Features:
- Opes a direct message window when you message someone or they message you
- Each window contains your DM chat with certain person
- Open and cycle through recent chats with a hotkey
- Execute emote commands on a player from their DM window without needing to manually target them
- Automatically record your chat log in an easy to read text file
- Fully customizable styles
Punchline: A direct message manager made in fashion of WoW Instant Messenger.

Author: Sevii
Name: Material UI
Description: Auto updating Material UI with customizable accent color and more. Icon by Mek

Author: Drahsid
Name: Better Shadows
Description: Directly adjust the distance of each shadow cascade! Now introducing 4k shadowmap!
Punchline: Take control of your shadows!

Author: Drahsid
Name: Hybrid Camera
Description: Hybrid camera/movement mode! Move freely!
Punchline: Legacy and standard movement in one! Move freely!

Author: Drahsid
Name: Resizable HUD
Description: Allows you to more freely and precisely scale and position HUD elements.
Punchline: Move and scale vanilla hud elements to your liking!

Author: Drahsid
Name: Target Lines
Description: Customizable target lines
Punchline: Customizable target lines

Author: NightmareXIV and AsunaTsuki
Name: DynamicBridge
Punchline: 可以根据设置的各种条件来自动更改角色外观。
Description: 通过设置规则预设，利用与其他流行插件的集成，使得角色外观随情境的变化自动无缝切换，丰富你的游戏体验，增加沉浸感。

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: HuntTrainAssistant
Punchline: [beta] Hunt train assistance tool.
Description: Provides useful tools for hunt trains such as: highlighting conductor messages and muting all other chat, auto-opening flags from conductors and auto-teleporting to announced destination.
Changelog: 6.5 update

Author: NightmareXIV, NiGuangOwO (本地化)
Name: Lifestream
Punchline: 一个加速城内以太水晶传送和跨服的插件
Description:
- 一键传送到任何服务器或城内以太水晶目的地
- 点击区域地图内的以太之光传送到它们

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: DSR Toolbox
Punchline: A helper plugin for Dragonsong's Reprise (Ultimate).
Description:
Current functions:
Resolve eyes position
Wroth flames automarker (whole group and personal)
Tether to your chain partner
Changelog: - Further 6.5 updates

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: AbyssosToolbox
Punchline: An assistance tool for fights in Abyssos.
Description: An assistance tool for fights in Abyssos.
Changelog: - 6.57 update

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: WeathermanExtras
Punchline: Experimental Weatherman functions.
Description: Experimental Weatherman functions. Use at your own risk.
Changelog: 6.5 update

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: TextAdvance
Punchline: Quest speedrunning assistance tool. Automatically skips subtitle boxes and confirms cutscene skipping
Changelog:
- All primary functions of the plugin are now out of beta testing.
- Separated quest target indicators settings into own tab (territory-specific settings will remain on territory-specific tab)
- Added Event object finder. When TextAdvance and quest target indicators are enabled, holding CTRL will highlight all nearby event objects. Key can be configured in settings.

Author: Eternita
Name: AntiAfkKick
Punchline: 防止挂机被自动踢下线，安装后生效，没设置项。

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: SelectString
Punchline: Select items in menus via 0-9 keys rather than mouse.
Description: Numpad is also supported. Note: some menus, like World Visit, are not supported, and whether they will be in future or not remains a question.
Changelog: 6.5 update

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Prioritizer
Punchline: Prioritizer sets game's priority to high while crafting.
Description: Prioritizer sets game's priority to high while crafting. No more failed crafts due to random lags while game is minimized.
Changelog: Preliminary 6.5 update

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: UnloadErrorFuckOff
Punchline: [For plugin developers only] A plugin that clears off load and unload errors.
Description: [For plugin developers only] A plugin that clears off load and unload errors. Plugin development is made easy once again!
Changelog: 6.5 update

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Imagenation
Punchline: An image drawing backend. To be used together with Triggernometry.
Description: An image drawing backend. To be used together with Triggernometry.
Changelog: 6.5 update

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: ObjectExplorer
Punchline: A convenient way to explore current objects around you.
Description: A convenient way to explore current objects around you. Currently supports players only.
Changelog: 6.5 update

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Instancinator
Punchline: [legacy plugin] One-click solution to change instances. Requires Yes Already.
Description: [legacy plugin] One-click solution to change instances. Requires Yes Already.

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: HaselTweaks
Description: Keep on tweaking.
Punchline: A collection of quality of life tweaks.
Changelog:
HaselTweaks

- Updated dependency SixLabors.ImageSharp to 3.1.3 (security fix for CVE-2024-27929).
- Removed dependency System.IO.Hashing, which is no longer needed in HaselTweaks.

Portrait Helper

- Changed: Thumbnails now use the preset ID instead of a hash for filenames. Existing thumbnails have been automatically renamed.  
  If errors occur, please check the console (`/xllog` - the lines are prefixed with `[MigrationV6]`) to see which files could not be renamed.

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: LeveHelper
Description: A little helper to check which Levequests have been completed and which are missing.
Punchline: A little helper for Levequests.
Changelog:
- Changed: The plugin now uses Dalamud's language setting and will fall back to English if there's no translation available. If you haven't changed the language in LeveHelper itself, nothing will change for you.
- Fixed: Issuer for Blood in the Water at level 68 was incorrect.  
  If someone could update it on the Gamer Escape's wiki, that would be awesome. I can't because my ISPs IP address is listed on DNSBL. ‍️

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: MogMogCheck
Description: MogMogCheck is a small plugin to assist you in tracking the rewards of the Moogle Treasure Trove event (called Mog Mog Kollektion in German, hence the name).
Punchline: Tracking assistant for Moogle Treasure Trove rewards
Changelog:
Update for The Second Hunt for Genesis.  
The rewards list *should* automatically switch over to the new items whenever the second hunt starts.  

- Added: A new configuration option was added to hide previous seasons (default on).  
  Reason: The game data lists all items in a single exchange shop. This option hides items using Irregular Tomestone of Genesis I whenever the second hunt starts.

Author: attick, daemitus, Khayle
Name: XIV Combo Expanded
Punchline: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button.
Description: This plugin condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. For example, a 1-2-3 combo would become 1-1-1.

Author: VariableVixen
Name: TinyCommands
Description: Adds tiny and simple but useful chat commands, and nothing more. It doesn't even have a UI.

Author: VariableVixen
Name: XivEsp
Description: If you've ever spent ten minutes looking for your hunt target, this is the plugin for you. Set a case-insensitive substring, glob, or regular expression, and all nearby game objects with matching names will be tagged on your screen!

Author: VariableVixen
Name: WoLua
Description: Write custom chat commands by creating lua scripts

Author: veyn
Name: vnavmesh
Punchline: Move around!
Description: Utility to automatically move the character around in the world, skilfully avoiding any obstacles.

Author: veyn
Name: V(ery) Island
Punchline: Automate island sanctuary activities
Description: Automate gathering, workshop assignments, etc.

Author: veyn
Name: Boss Mod
Punchline: 大脑按摩用的
Description: 来自y佬维护版编译，仅保留画图，还不快说谢谢y佬

Author: veyn
Name: Easier Faux Hollows
Punchline: Faux Hollows solver based on known patterns
Description: Based on ezFauxHollows, but uses known patterns instead of general-purpose solver.

Author: veyn
Name: vfallguy
Punchline: Get that achievement!
Description: Bot that does fall guys event automatically.

Author: Taurenkey, kawaii
Name: Artisan
Punchline: A 'simple' crafting plugin.
Description: The all-in-one crafting plugin.

Author: Taurenkey (Puni.sh), NiGuangOwO (本地化&功能维护)
Name: Pandora's Box
Punchline: 你敢打开潘多拉的盒子吗？（在线安装 Only）
Description:
Pandora's Box是一个改善游戏体验和一些功能调整的集合
闲鱼倒卖的家里人都死了，把仓库地址打码然后赚个信息差的，可真是牛逼
Changelog:
修复自动重登
不要在官方Discord提问题，官方开发者不做国服适配工作，不要再让我看到有笨比去提问
遇到漏翻译的文本请用各种方式告诉我

Author: kawaii, NightmareXIV
Name: AutoRetainer
Punchline: Collect and assign ventures to your retainers from the comfort of your bed.
Description: Collect and assign ventures to your retainers from the comfort of your bed.
Changelog: /ays m e/d

Author: 53m1k0l0n/Gidedin (Puni.sh)/NiGuangOwO (本地化)
Name: LazyLoot
Punchline: 一(自)键(动)Roll点用的 (在线安装Only)
Description:
带有各种参数的Roll点命令 need | greed | pass
聊天和Toast输出以及Roll点延迟。
Changelog: API9

Author: daemitus, kawaii
Name: Yes Already
Punchline: Clicks Yes in various dialogs you've specified.
Description: Tired of clicking yes in Praetorium? Can't stand using keys in dungeons? Well do I have the plugin for you! Yes Already is specifically designed to click all the annoying dialogs you've grown accustomed facerolling. Just enter the dialog text, and you'll never see it again! Also works with /regex/ and has several built-in modules for dialogs that aren't quite yes/no prompts but act like it (like desynth).

Author: Det, Taurenkey
Name: Auto Hook
Punchline: Makes fishing less (or more) boring
Description: It hooks the fish for you, can you believe it?
Changelog: Fixed an issue with the fish counter not being reset correctly after a swap

Author: NightmareXIV, kawaii
Name: Splatoon
Punchline: Redefining FFXIV navigation with unlimited, precise waymarks.
Description: Splatoon is a powerful accessibility tool. It revolutionizes gameplay with its custom waymark system, offering the ability to create unlimited grouped waymarks, labels, and actor indicators with exacting pixel precision. This feature empowers players by making crucial objects and events more visually discernible, thereby facilitating quicker reactions. However, it's important to note that the plugin does not come pre-loaded with presets. Players have the freedom to craft their own or import existing ones, offering a personalized touch to their gaming experience.

Author: kawaii, NightmareXIV
Name: Avarice
Punchline: Positional feedback with pixel perfect rear/flank tracking, range indicators, and more.
Description: Positional feedback with pixel perfect rear/flank tracking, range indicators, and more.

Author: kawaii, NightmareXIV
Name: Orbwalker
Punchline: S P A C E G L I D I N G
Description: Locks player movement while casting and allows for maximum caster uptime during the course of a fight.

Author: kawaii
Name: Palace Pal
Punchline: Shows possible trap & Accursed Hoard locations in Palace of The Dead, Heaven on High, and Eureka Orthos.
Description:
Shows possible trap & Accursed Hoard locations in Palace of The Dead, Heaven on High, and Eureka Orthos.

This plugin requires Splatoon in order to render various draws on the screen.

Author: Taurenkey
Name: Saucy
Punchline: When working for MGP is too much effort.
Description: Automates certain Gold Saucer mini-games.
Changelog: Fix Triple Triad sometimes not playing

Description: Add /voiceroid2 command into FFXIV. Require SimpleVoiceroid2Proxy (https://github.com/SlashNephy/SimpleVoiceroid2Proxy).
Name: Divination.Voiceroid2Talker
Punchline: Text-to-Speech for Voiceroid2

Author: darkarchon
Name: Mare Synchronos
Description: This plugin will synchronize your Penumbra mods and current Glamourer state with other paired clients automatically.
Punchline: Let others see you as you see yourself.

Author: akira0245
Name: Radar
Description:
在屏幕和游戏地图上显示游戏实体的位置。
Displays game objects location on screen and map.
Punchline: Displays game objects location on screen and map.

Author: yomishino
Name: ActionEffectRange
Punchline: 显示技能的影响范围
Description:
This plugin provides a visual cue on the effect range of the AoE action you just used.

May be used as a supplement/replacement to the actions' VFXs in showing effect range related information, such as where has the action landed and how large an area it covered.

Author: gamous
Name: PostMeteion
Description: 梅蒂恩会执行光呆的指令并汇报成果，通过HttpApi与Webhook
Punchline: Meteion will process the command you post and report information.

Author: Liza Carvelli
Name: Fish Notify
Description: 钓鱼咬钩时根据咬钩力度播放声音，同时聊天框提醒
Punchline: Plays a sound when a fish is caught

Author: LeonBlade
Name: Burning Down the House
Description: 根据坐标移动装修物品，解除游戏限制。

Author: he0119
Name: Blind Box
Description:
用来统计盲盒中物品获得情况的插件。
/blindbox 打开盲盒信息界面。
/blindbox config 打开设置界面。
Punchline: 查看盲盒中物品的获得情况。

Author: Youri
Name: FFXIV Money Tracker
Punchline: For when you want to know how much you spend/earn in ffxiv!
Description: 记账 For when you want to know how much you spend/earn in ffxiv!

Author: Asvel
Name: Literal Map Link
Punchline: 将地图坐标文本自动转换为地图链接
Description:
在聊天框发送地图坐标文本时会自动转换为可点击的地图链接
Turn map coordinates literal into interactable map link when you post in-game chat messages.
WARNING: currently it's only tested under Chinese version FFXIV client.

Author: Chalkos
Name: Marketbuddy
Punchline: 简化日常的市场出售操作
Description: Helper for your day-to-day market operations.
Changelog: patch 6.2 fix, dalamud api7 and .net6

Author: akira0245, Ori
Name: MidiBard 2
Description:
Bard performance using midi files or keyboard.
- Solo and ensemble mode support
- Text commands for instrument equip and switch
Supported by FFXIV Bards & Bands Community: discord.gg/ff14bard
Punchline:
Bard performance using midi files or keyboard.
Supported by FFXIV Bards & Bands Community: discord.gg/ff14bard
Changelog:
API7, .NET 6.0.
Known Issue: Sometimes your guitar always sound as overdriven LOCALLY. This only affects yourself and will NOT affect what others hear your guitar(you may use an alt to verify this).

Author: Meisterlala
Name: Neko Fans NSFW 18+ Patch
Description:
This Plugin does nothing on its own. Neko Fans needs to be installed.
You now have access to NSFW images in Neko Fans.
Punchline: Frustrated in a dungeon? Look at a cute cat girl! Or look at sexy anime tiddies!

Author: NightmareXIV,Errer(本地特化)
Name: Splatoon
Punchline: 国服画家 6.5CN 解限特供
Description: 国服特供SPLX 6.5CN 本地加载有问题请使用库链接更新。

Author: gamous
Name: Chameleon
Punchline: Real fakename in memory
Description: [Testing]Real fakename in memory

Author: UnknownX
Name: ReAction
Punchline: QoL for the battle system.
Description: Improves aspects of the battle system with action stacks (like MOAction) and various QoL settings.

Author: a08381
Name: SkipCutscene
Description: 坏孩子辍学。

Author: gamous
Name: NekoMaster
Punchline: Let neko manage your plugins!
Description: Super plugin manager with friendly UI and commands.

Author: Adam
Name: Penumbra
Description: 运行时mod加载和管理器。

Author: Ottermandias
Name: Glamourer
Punchline: 改变和保存玩家外观。
Description:
为玩家提供更改保存自定义外貌和装备外观的功能。
将预览选项添加到了Penumbra的“模组-更改项目”选项卡中。
需要安装并启用Penumbra才能工作。

Author: Tischel
Name: TPieCN
Description:
高可配置性的环形热键栏，可以通过绑定热键进行切换。
可以使用动作、物品、套装和宏。
Punchline: 可自定义的环形热键栏

Author: UnknownX
Name: Cammy
Punchline: A simple editor for the game's camera settings
Description:
A simple camera editor to change various game defaults such as zoom and fov.
This is a zoom hack, if you aren't comfortable with that fact, don't install it.
Changelog: Added view bobbing, added free cam support for both GPose and Duty Recorder, removed useless settings, fixed several bugs related to camera settings resetting

Author: XIV Tools
Name: Customize+
Description: 这个插件允许你创建和应用Anamnesis样式的身体缩放，并在游戏中的角色身上实时保持。
Punchline: 突破FF14的限制，自定义你的角色。

Author: Chirp
Name: Ktisis
Description: 强大的姿势工具，用于在GPose集体动作中拍照。cmp姿势文件导入来自Yarukon。
Changelog: 想体验0.3版，请在插件管理器右键此插件，勾选接受测试版本插件。

Author: Caraxi
Name: Simple Heels
Description: 穿着高跟鞋时调整你的角色与地面之间的距离，另一个高跟鞋插件，功能更强大。
Punchline: 穿着高跟鞋时调整你的角色与地面之间的距离，另一个高跟鞋插件，功能更强大。

Author: Asgard
Name: Brio
Description: 在集体动作模式中控制参与的角色。

Author: Asgard
Name: XAT
Description: 创建编辑动作和镜头控制

Author: kawaii
Name: Moodles
Description: 使用格式、持续时间和其他参数来设计应用你自己的状态效果。
Punchline: 可怕的负面情绪现在以debuff的形式出现了，库啵！

Author: UnknownX
Name: Fractionality
Punchline: DEPRECATED
Description: This plugin is available as an option in ReAction now.

Author: UnknownX
Name: DalamudRepoBrowser
Punchline: Browse and add third party repositories in an instant
Description: An interface for browsing and managing third party repositories.

Author: UnknownX
Name: NoClippy
Punchline: Reduces the effects of lag on certain aspects of the game, and can show GCD clips
Description: Reduces the effects of lag on certain aspects of the game, such as weaving and statuses. Usable as an alternative, or in addition, to XivAlexander.

Author: UnknownX
Name: OOBlugin
Punchline: oob oob
Description: oob oob

Author: daemitus
Name: ezWondrousTails
Punchline: Adds row probabilities to the Wondrous Tails display.
Description: This plugin prints the probability of getting a row in Wondrous Tails to the in-game display along with the average probability of what would happen if you shuffled.

Author: croizat
Name: Something Need Doing (Expanded Edition)
Punchline: Work work.
Description: Now for more than crafting!

Name: LiFu
Punchline: LiFu
Description: LiFu
Changelog: Updated for API4

Name: Line
Description: 查看身为线和狩猎怪

Author: Usagi
Name: IINACT
Punchline: A parsing plugin.
Description: 能在replay里面使用的和使用edgetts的加强版

Name: SeeBuff
Punchline: buff显示
Description: SeeBuff/n 能通过/SeeBuff ID buffid time 来自定义显示buff

Name: DDD
Description: 发送数据到inact

Name: SeletRollItem
Punchline: 自定义快捷键后，鼠标移动到物品上快速roll点或放弃
Description:
自定义快捷键后，鼠标移动到物品上快速roll点或放弃
使用/SeletRollItem pai能排相关副本理符/SeletRollItem pai 随机任务：练级排练级本

Name: AutoFaka
Description:
能自动发卡和抽卡并查看dps
//faka dixing把地星放在中场，/faka liyi把礼仪之花放在中间，/faka chong自动帮你重抽,

Name: Lock
Punchline: 锁定
Description: 锁定BOSS /LockBOSS change 1 靠近水晶切换1号线路

Author: 牙刷play
Name: SeeBoss
Punchline: A parsing plugin.
Description: 方便查看buffid和bossid和技能id

Author: Aki, k-kz, ele-starshade, damolitionn, Taurenkey, Augporto, grimgal, Genesis-Nova, Tartarga
Name: XIVSlothComboX
Punchline: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button - and then some.
Description: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button - and then some.
Changelog: Optimise GNB_GF_Continuation

Author: NiGuangOwO
Name: FuckAnimationLock (API9)
Punchline: 改动画锁，优化循环手感，但并不能把Logs从蓝色变成金色，懂？
Description:
打本我就要三插，闲鱼小店死个妈
某些绿玩能不能别洗了，底层屎山加垃圾服务器延迟导致手感稀烂，自己玩起来不觉得膈应吗？
我开你别劝，我劝你也开，开了更流畅，兄弟们开
Changelog: 打断LB硬直换成新的更暴力的方法，读完条直接可以移动。PVP区域不生效

Author: Liza Carvelli (Puni.sh)/ NiGuangOwO (本地化)
Name: Palace Pal
Punchline: 在死宫、天宫和正统优雷卡显示潜在陷阱和埋藏的宝藏。
Description:
在死宫、天宫和正统优雷卡显示潜在陷阱和埋藏的宝藏。

这个插件需要Splatoon才能在屏幕上渲染绘图。

Author: Meisterlala
Name: Neko Fans
Description:
Shows you an image of a random neko character. Click on the image to view the next one.
You can choose different image sources, allowing you to look at Catboys, Waifus, Cats, Dogs and more.

Supported APIs:
nekos.best, Nekos.life, Dog CEO, The Cat API, Pic.re, Waifu.im, Waifu.pics and shibe.online

Warning: You might see naughty images
Punchline: Frustrated in a dungeon? Look at a cute cat girl!

Author: Asteria Nocturna
Name: Divination.PowerUtils
Punchline: Save Energy!

Author: KangasZ
Name: UI Anti AFK Kick

Author: KangasZ
Name: Radar Plugin
Punchline: See everything through walls
Description:
3D Radar to see enemies, objects, and interactables through walls.
This is an ESP, please don't use it to call aliens down.
Please report any issues to the author.
Changelog:
Significant changes to backend - experimental last move tracking for mobs
Addition of more fine-grained mob settings - now it is full mob customization
New UI to view all mob-based customizations.
Better aggro type handling on aggro circle.

Author: grittyfrog
Name: Macro Mate (alpha)
Description:
Macro Mate lets you store and run an unlimited number of macros. You can also bind macros to normal macro slots.

For example, you can:

- Automatically swap in the correct raid macro when you enter an instance
- Store longer macros and automatically split them across multiple macro slots.
- Use almost any icon in the game for your Macros
Punchline: Store and run an unlimited number of macros. Bind them to normal macro slots.

Author: croizat
Name: Rotation Solver
Punchline: Analyses combat information every frame and finds the best action.
Description:
Analyses combat information every frame and finds the best action.

This means almost all the information available in one frame in combat, including the status of all players in the party, the status of any hostile targets, skill cooldowns, the MP and HP of characters, the location of characters, casting status of the hostile target, combo, combat duration, player level, etc.

Then, it will highlight the best action on the hot bar, or help you to click on it.

It is designed for `general combat`, not for savage or ultimate. Use it carefully.

Author: croizat
Name: Automaton
Punchline: Extra illegal
Description: Collection of tweaks that either do not fit in the main plugin or are being tested here.
